title: (x) "Fascinating" casual soft bold sans - Grilled Cheese BTN {Marcelo Rodi}
content:

author: susancita25

comments.content: Looks like [Grilled Cheese BTN Toasted](http://web.archive.org/web/20110220222029/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/btn/grilled-cheese-btn/toasted/)... without the ladybugs...
